content: my feather and fan top has all the characteristics that i look for in a crocheted top pattern top-down in-the-round and seamless other favorites are lace a timeless stitch pattern and waist shaping check check and check you can use any dk yarn for this top just pick the hook size that gives you the finished size you want i think this top looks best with zero or negative ease but that is of course up to you makes a great summer top when made in rayon cotton or linen blends or create a cozy layering piece for the colder months with kid mohair wool acrylic or alpaca please let me know if you have any questions or find any errors comments welcome german translation provided courtesy of katja-kurz thank you
